Addresses are opaque objects that uniquely identify Nodes.

H

handleMessage(Message, Address) - Method in class dslabs.framework.Node

handleMessage(Message, Address, Address) - Method in class dslabs.framework.Node
Do not use. Only used by testing framework.
hasResult() - Method in interface dslabs.framework.Client

I

O
